author: ChuyuanLiu
body:
#### PR description:

Fix the incorrect axis title offset induced by the following change in ROOT 6.26
- Offsets for axis titles with absolute-sized fonts (size%10 == 3) are now relative only to the font size (i.e. no longer relative to pad dimensions).

#### PR validation:

Tested on the regular phase2 RelVal TTbar samples.
title: Fix axis title in tracking validation plots
